name: Telekinetic Abilities Showcase
description:
Controls
  • W,A,S,D - Movement
  • Mouse Scroll - Change between castings (All 14)
  • Q - Ability Crush
  • E - Ability Grab Impulse
  • R - Ability Radial Push

Castings by default use the left mouse button to activate the ability with some exceptions where the right mouse button is also used to target objects.
